channel.title: project on danieln.de
channel.description: Recent content in project on danieln.de

item.title: A toy CHIP-8 Interpreter
item.description: A few days ago, I discovered an old project on an even older HDD. I suspect that this was my first time tinkering with emulators, and also my first time trying out Python 3. It turned out quite alright.

item.title: QMK keymaps and custom keys
item.description: I recently decided to get a new keyboard, as I have been typing on my notebook until now. I’ve aways been interested in mechanical keyboards, but haven’t been willing to break the bank for parts I’d even solder myself.
